pyepo.twostage
==============

.. py:module:: pyepo.twostage

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Two-stage predict then optimize model

----------

Functions

   pyepo.twostage.sklearnPred

Package Contents
----------------

.. py:function:: sklearnPred(pmodel)

   Two-stage prediction and optimization with scikit-learn.

   :param pmodel: scikit-learn regression model
   :type pmodel: Regressor

   :returns: scikit-learn multi-output regression model
   :rtype: MultiOutputRegressor


.. py:function:: autoSklearnPred(optmodel, seed, timelimit, metric='mse')

   Two-stage prediction and optimization with auto-sklearn.

   :param optmodel: optimization model
   :type optmodel: optModel

   :returns: Auto-sklearn multi-output regression model
   :rtype: AutoSklearnRegressor
